channel.title: 2025-03-24s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-03-24s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: ETVA: Evaluation of Text-to-Video Alignment via Fine-grained Question Generation and Answering
item.description: ETVA evaluates text-to-video alignment via fine-grained question generation and answering.

item.title: FFaceNeRF: Few-shot Face Editing in Neural Radiance Fields
item.description: FFaceNeRF: Enables few-shot face editing in NeRFs via geometry adapter & latent mixing, enhancing control & quality with limited training data.

item.title: MAPS: A Multi-Agent Framework Based on Big Seven Personality and Socratic Guidance for Multimodal Scientific Problem Solving
item.description: MAPS solves multimodal scientific problems better by combining multiple agents and Socratic learning.

item.title: MARS: A Multi-Agent Framework Incorporating Socratic Guidance for Automated Prompt Optimization
item.description: MARS: Optimizing prompts with multi-agent collaboration and Socratic learning for better LLM performance!

item.title: Modifying Large Language Model Post-Training for Diverse Creative Writing
item.description: This paper introduces deviation-factored post-training methods to enhance diversity and quality in creative LLM writing.

item.title: OpenVLThinker: An Early Exploration to Complex Vision-Language Reasoning via Iterative Self-Improvement
item.description: OpenVLThinker: Iteratively refining vision-language models for complex reasoning, bridging the gap to R1-style capabilities.

item.title: PVChat: Personalized Video Chat with One-Shot Learning
item.description: PVChat: Personalize video understanding with one-shot learning, enabling identity-aware video comprehension.

item.title: TaoAvatar: Real-Time Lifelike Full-Body Talking Avatars for Augmented Reality via 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: TaoAvatar: Lifelike talking avatars in AR, using 3D Gaussian Splatting for real-time rendering and high fidelity.

item.title: When Preferences Diverge: Aligning Diffusion Models with Minority-Aware Adaptive DPO
item.description: Adaptive Diffusion Models with Minority-Aware Adaptive DPO

item.title: Bridging Continuous and Discrete Tokens for Autoregressive Visual Generation
item.description: TokenBridge bridges continuous and discrete tokens for autoregressive visual generation, achieving high-quality synthesis with simple autoregressive modeling.

item.title: Generalized Few-shot 3D Point Cloud Segmentation with Vision-Language Model
item.description: GFS-VL: Enhancing few-shot 3D segmentation by synergizing vision-language models with few-shot learning for robust real-world application.

item.title: When Less is Enough: Adaptive Token Reduction for Efficient Image Representation
item.description: Efficient image representation via adaptive token reduction.

item.title: From Head to Tail: Towards Balanced Representation in Large Vision-Language Models through Adaptive Data Calibration
item.description: ADR balances visual-language models by adaptively calibrating long-tail data, boosting LLaVA 1.5 by 4.36% without increasing training data volume.

item.title: Implicit Bias-Like Patterns in Reasoning Models
item.description: AI reasoning models reveal bias-like patterns, processing association-incompatible info with more computational effort, mirroring human implicit biases.
